verses.roman:
saṁsāra-tāraṇa-hetu yei icchā-śakti
tāhāra milana kari' ekatā yaiche prāpti

synonyms: saṁsāra-tāraṇa-hetu—for delivering the entire world; yei—that; icchā-śakti—the potency of will; tāhāra—of that will; milana kari'-by the meeting; ekatā—oneness; yaiche—so that; prāpti—obtainment.
translation: "The supreme desire to deliver the entire world meets in both of Them, and for that reason also They are one and the same.
